title: Achieving reversible Zn chemistry by constructing a built-in internal electric field to dynamically eliminate local charge accumulation
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01313A, Paper
Xueru Yang, Zhaoyu Zhang, Yufei Zhang, Wencheng Du, Minghui Ye, Yongchao Tang, Zhipeng Wen, Xiaoqing Liu, Cheng Chao Li
An innovative concept of constructing a built-in interfacial electric field for Zn stabilization is demonstrated using amphoteric polyelectrolyte complexes (CPs).
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
